content:
Is there a simple example to show the dbconcat breakage? The following seems to work:

./bin/mged share/db/ktank.g dbconcat share/db/m35.g
./bin/mged share/db/ktank.g tops
air/                engine/             r682/R              tank/
all.g/              g17/                r683/R
cab.g/              old.s79             r684/R
computer/           old.s82             r685/R
